## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a652e8cb279a3db5d1420008c3f3fc8c11aab4463f7ed61925ca409f18066b19)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@dle-clo-bento-component/dist' @ 13.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
